person.persName: John James Landram (Gallatin Co. Lawyer/Politician/18th Kentucky)

body.p: Born in Warsaw, Kentucky. Served in Mexican-American War in Battle of Buena Vista under General Zachary Taylor. Elected to Kentucky General Assembly as a Whig in 1851. Graduate of University of Louisville Law School. Unsuccessfully ran for the legislature in 1861. Mustered into service as a Lieutenant Colonel in the Eighteenth Kentucky Volunteers in February of 1862. Defeated by Confederate General John Hunt Morgan at Cynthiana in July of 1862. Wounded at the Battle of Richmond on August 30, 1862 losing the sight in his left eye. Elected to the State Senate in 1863 for Gallatin, Grant, and Boone counties and served until 1867.
